creator: leumas@solv.com
text:
auth_ldap causes bus error in solaris 9, compiler gcc 3.3.  A cheap workaround
is to touch /tmp/mod_ldap_cache and chown it 0, before running apache, so it
cannot use the ldap filter cache.  I have debugged the code a little bit, and it
is crashing when trying to add to the shmem cache, in a shmem alloc function call.

creator: mads@apache.org
text:
This sounds like one of the problems that have been fixed in 2.0.49-dev.
Can you give http://httpd.apache.org/dev/dist/httpd-2.0.49-rc1.tar.gz a try?
